page.title: 13New Health Centre
page.content:
The doctors have made plans to make a new surgery because the old one is inconveniant,not big enough and it does not have enough facilities.It will cost around Â£140,000.The land was mostly bought from a man called Murray Mountain and some other small bits were bought from other people.The land was bought for about Â£25,000.
The new surgery will have 14 or 15 members of staff part time and full time.There will be 3 doctors,1 full time nurse,1 part time nurse,2 part time health visitors,1 midwife, 1 nursing auxilllery,4 part time receptionists and 1 cleaner plus the odd one or two extras.The three doctors are Dr. Jeffrey Webb,Dr.Roger Bark and Dr. Elaine Griffiths. There are just over 5000 patients regestered with them.
